meanings.sent1: He begotten a son last year.
meanings.sent2: The man begotten three children in his lifetime.
meanings.sent3: The father joked that he had begotten a little troublemaker.
meanings.sent4: His actions begotten a new era of understanding between them.
meanings.sent5: The idea he presented begotten a wave of excitement among the team.

meanings.definition: (of a woman) to give birth to
meanings.sent1: She begotten a healthy baby girl yesterday.
meanings.sent2: The mother begotten twins after a long labor.
meanings.sent3: The expecting mother proudly announced she would soon begotten a new member of the family.
meanings.sent4: Her determination begotten a beautiful new chapter in her life.
meanings.sent5: The arrival of the baby begotten joy and celebration in the household.

meanings.sent1: His hard work begotten success in his career.
meanings.sent2: The project begotten great interest from investors.
meanings.sent3: The chef's secret recipe begotten a lot of curiosity among the guests.
meanings.sent4: Their collaboration begotten a masterpiece that amazed everyone.
meanings.sent5: The discovery begotten a breakthrough in the field of science.
